body.p:
Shepherdsville July 2 1861
Hon. Beriah Magoffin.
Gov. of Kentucky.
Dear Sir,

Preston Troutman was fined at our last court the sum of three hundred dollars. The fine is excessive. he is poor and has a family and is unable to pay it, he was not present at the trial as I am informed on account of the sickness of his wife; other dependants, who were present, were acquitted & were more concerned in the transaction than Troutman as has come out since the trial; I respectfully request you to interpose in his behalf.
